IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM SYS.procedures WHERE name = 'SP_GenerateLumCostSplit' AND SCHEMA_ID = SCHEMA_ID('dbo') ) DROP PROCEDURE [dbo].[SP_GenerateLumCostSplit] GO
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[SP_GenerateLumCostSplit] @P0 Char(6), @CompanyID int, @StCostVarAcct nvarchar(10)
AS BEGIN --Truncate table Truncate Table [dbo].[LumCostSplit]
INSERT INTO [dbo].[LumCostSplit] ([UsrSplited], [CompanyID], [Module], [BatchNbr], [Status], [FinPeriodID], [CuryID], [Description], [CreatedByID], [CreatedDateTime], [LastModifiedByID], [LastModifiedDateTime], [AccountID], [AccountCD], [AccountDescription], [Qty], [DebitAmt], [CreditAmt], [InventoryID], [InventoryCD], [InventoryDescr], [Released], [TranID], [TranType], [StdCost], [StdCostDate], [UnitCost], [CostDiffer], [STDCostVariance], [SubID]) SELECT [Batch].[UsrSplited], [Batch].[CompanyID], [Batch].[Module], [Batch].[BatchNbr], [Batch].[Status], [Batch].[FinPeriodID], [Batch].[CuryID], [Batch].[Description], [Batch].[CreatedByID], [Batch].[CreatedDateTime], [Batch].[LastModifiedByID], [Batch].[LastModifiedDateTime], [Account].[AccountID], [Account].[AccountCD], [Account].[Description], [GLTran].[Qty], [GLTran].[DebitAmt], [GLTran].[CreditAmt], [InventoryItem].[InventoryID], [InventoryItem].[InventoryCD], [InventoryItem].[Descr], [GLTran].[Released], [GLTran].[TranID], [GLTran].[TranType], [InventoryItem].[StdCost], [InventoryItem].[StdCostDate], ABS(CASE WHEN([GLTran].[DebitAmt] + [GLTran].[CreditAmt] = 0 OR ([GLTran].[Qty] = 0)) THEN 0 ELSE ([GLTran].[DebitAmt] + [GLTran].[CreditAmt]) / [GLTran].[Qty] END) AS 'UnitCost', (CASE WHEN CASE WHEN [GLTran].[Qty] <> 0 THEN ([GLTran].[DebitAmt] + [GLTran].[CreditAmt]) - ([InventoryItem].[StdCost] * ABS( [GLTran].[Qty])) ELSE 0 END = 0 THEN '' ELSE 'X' END) AS 'CostDiffer', (CASE WHEN [GLTran].[Qty] <> 0 THEN ([GLTran].[DebitAmt] + [GLTran].[CreditAmt]) - ([InventoryItem].[StdCost] * ABS([GLTran].[Qty])) ELSE 0 END) AS 'STDCostVariance', [GLTran].[SubID] from Batch left join Ledger on Ledger.CompanyID = Batch.CompanyID and Ledger.LedgerID = Batch.LedgerID left join Branch on Branch.CompanyID = Batch.CompanyID and Branch.BranchID = Batch.BranchID inner join GLTran on GLTran.CompanyID = Batch.CompanyID and GLTran.BatchNbr = Batch.BatchNbr and GLTran.Module = Batch.Module inner join Account on Account.CompanyID = GLTran.CompanyID and Account.AccountID = GLTran.AccountID left join BAccount on BAccount.CompanyID = GLTran.CompanyID and BAccount.BAccountID = GLTran.ReferenceID inner join InventoryItem on InventoryItem.CompanyID = GLTran.CompanyID and InventoryItem.InventoryID = GLTran.InventoryID where Batch.CompanyID = @CompanyID and Batch.FinPeriodID = @P0 and Account.AccountCD <> @StCostVarAcct and Account.Type = 'E' order by InventoryItem.InventoryCD
--remove differ = X DELETE LumCostSplit where CostDiffer <> 'X' END
